body_html: This script may help you. https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/quantize/python/fold_batch_norms.py . In deed, if you run tf 1.9, grappler always optimize batch normalization when possible.

body: This script may help you. https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/quantize/python/fold_batch_norms.py . In deed, if you run tf 1.9, grappler always optimize batch normalization when possible.
